S04bsu005_u:2_0: bhagavānāha - kaścāsau bhikṣavo 'rthaviniścayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ? yaduktam - pañca skandhāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:2_1: pañcopādānaskandhāḥ / aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ / dvādaśāyatanāni / dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:2_2: catvāri āryasatyāni / dvāviṃśati indriyāṇi / catvāri dhyānāni / [catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ] /
S04bsu005_u:2_3: catvāro brahmavihārāḥ / catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ / catasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ / catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni / catvāri samyakprahāṇāni / catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ / pañcendriyāṇi / pañca balāni / sapta bodhyaṅgāni / āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ / ṣoḍaśākārā ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ / catvāri srotāpattyaṅgāni / daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni /
S04bsu005_u:3_0: (1) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katame pañca skandhāḥ? tadyathā - rūpaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:3_1: vedanāskandhaḥ / saṃjñāskandhaḥ / saṃskāraskandhaḥ / vijñānaskandhaḥ / ime bhikṣavaḥ pañca skandhāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:4_0: (2) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katame pañcopādānaskandhāḥ? tadyathā - rūpopādānaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:4_1: vedanopādānaskandhaḥ / saṃjñopādānaskandhaḥ / saṃskāropādānaskandhaḥ / vijñānopādānaskandhaḥ / ime bhikṣavaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:5_0: (3) tatra bhikṣavaṃ katame 'ṣṭadaśa dhātavaḥ? tadyathā - cakṣudhātuḥ /
S04bsu005_u:5_1: rūpadhātuḥ / cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ / śrotadhātuḥ / śabdadhātuḥ / śrotravijñānadhātuḥ / ghrāṇadhātuḥ / gandhadhātuḥ / ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ / jihvādhātuḥ / rasadhātuḥ / jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ / kāyadhātuḥ / sparśadhātuḥ / kāyavijñānadhātuḥ / manodhātuḥ / dharmadhātuḥ / manovijñānadhātuḥ / ime bhikṣava ucyante 'ṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:6_0: (4) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni dvādaśāyatanāni? yaduta cakṣuradhyātmikamāyatanam /
S04bsu005_u:6_1: rūpamadhyātmikamāyatanam / śrotramadhyātmikamāyatanam / śabdo bāhyamāyatanam / ghrāṇamadhyātmikamāyatanam / gandho bāhyamāyatanam / jihvā adhyātmikamāyatanam / raso bāhyamāyatanam / kāyo 'dhyātmikamāyatanam / sparśo bāhyamāyatanam / mana adhyātmikamāyatanam / dharmo bāhyamāyatanam / imāni bhikṣava ucyante dvādaśāyatanāni /
S04bsu005_u:7_0: (5) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamo dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ? avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:7_1: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
S04bsu005_u:7_3: sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayādupādānam / upādānapratyayādbhavaḥ / bhavapratyayājjātiḥ / jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ (AvSū,
S04bsu005_u:7_4: Vaidya 312) saṃbhavanti / evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu005_u:7_15: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
S04bsu005_u:8_1: aparānte 'jñānam / pūrvā(ntā) parānte 'jñānam / adhyātma ajñānam / bahirdhā ajñānam / adhyātmabahirdhā ajñānam / karmaṇyajñānam / vipāke 'jñānam / karmavipāke 'jñānam / sukṛte 'jñānam / duṣkṛte 'jñānam / sukṛtaduṣkṛteṣu dharmeṣvajñānam /
S04bsu005_u:8_4: buddhe 'jñānam / dharme 'jñānam / saṃghe 'jñānam / duḥkhe 'jñānam / samudaye 'jñānam / nirodhe 'jñānam / mārge 'jñānam / kuśale 'jñānam / akuśale 'jñānam / kuśalākuśaleṣu dharmeṣvajñānam /
S04bsu005_u:8_8: dharmeṣvajñānam / atīte 'jñānam / anāgate 'jñānam / pratyutpanne 'jñānam / atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvajñānam /
S04bsu005_u:9_1: saṃskārāḥ katame? trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ - kāyasaṃskāraḥ vāksaṃskāraḥ manaḥsaṃskāraśca /
S04bsu005_u:9_4: kāyaṃ niśritya vartate / tasmādāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyasaṃskāra ityucyate /
S04bsu005_u:9_5: / vāksaṃskāraḥ katamaḥ? vitarkayitvā vicārayitvā vācaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu005_u:9_8: cittasya ca, tenāsya yā cetanā / caitasiko hyeṣa dharmaḥ / cittaniśritaḥ cittapratibaddhaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:9_9: cittaṃ niśritya pravartate / tasmāccetanā manaḥsaṃskāra ityucyate /
S04bsu005_u:11_3: saṃjñāskandhaḥ / saṃskāraskandhaḥ / vijñānaskandhaḥ / idaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 313) nāma / rūpaṃ katamat? yatkiṃcidrūpam,
S04bsu005_u:11_5: tadyathā - pṛthivīdhātuḥ / abdhātuḥ / tejodhātuḥ / vāyudhātuḥ // pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yadgurutvaṃ ca karkaśatvaṃ ca /
S04bsu005_u:11_8: vāyudhātuḥ katamaḥ? yadākuñcanaḥ prasāraṇaḥ laghusamudīraṇatvaṃ ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_0: (e) sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanā katamā? ṣaḍ vedanāḥ / katame(māḥ?)ṣaṭ? cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_1: śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_2: ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_3: jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_4: kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:14_5: manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
S04bsu005_u:15_0: (o) vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / katamā tṛṣṇā? ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:17_2: katame trayaḥ? kāmabhavaḥ / rūpabhavaḥ / ārūpyabhavaśca / tatra kāmabhavaḥ katamaḥ? tadyathā - narakāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:17_3: tiryañcapretāḥ / asurāḥ / ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ // tadyathā - aṣṭau mahānarakāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:17_5: saṃjīvaḥ / kālasūtraḥ / saṃghātaḥ / dvau ca rauravau / tapanaḥ / pratāpanaḥ / avīciśca / iti // mahānarakāḥ // tadyathā - arbudaḥ / nirarbudaḥ / aṭaṭaḥ / hahavaḥ / huhuvaḥ / utpalaḥ / padmaḥ / mahāpadmaḥ // katame ṣaṭ devāḥ? cāturmahārājikā devāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:17_6: trāyastriṃśāḥ / yāmāḥ / tuṣitāḥ / nirmāṇaratayaḥ / paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:17_8: / abṛhāḥ / atapāḥ / abṛhāḥ / sudarśanāḥ / akaniṣṭhāśceti // ārūpyadhātavaḥ katamāḥ? tadyathā - (AvSū,
S04bsu005_u:17_10: vijñānānantyāyatanam / ākiṃcanyāyatanam / naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam // ārūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ cittamātramadhyāyināṃ cāturvidhā upapattiḥ /
S04bsu005_u:18_0: (ga) bhavapratyayā jātiriti / jātiḥ katamāḥ? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ,
S04bsu005_u:19_1: jarā katamā?) nikāyasabhāgatāyāstasyā yat khālityaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kub jagopānasīvakratā khurukhuruśvāsapraśvāsaśca tilakālakopahatagātratā purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍāvaṣṭambhatā indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃbhārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaṃ hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ /
S04bsu005_u:19_2: iyamucyate jarā // tatra maraṇaṃ katamat? yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmācchavikāyāccyutiḥ cyavanatā bhedo 'ntardhānaṃ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā āyuṣo hāniḥ uṣmaṇo hāniḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:19_3: idamucyate maraṇam // yadetanmaraṇaṃ pūrvikā ca jarā,
S04bsu005_u:20_3: jarā duḥkham / vyādhirduḥkham / maraṇaṃ duḥkham / priyaviprayogo duḥkham / apriyasaṃyogo duḥkham / rūpaṃ duḥkham / vedanā duḥkham / saṃjñā duḥkham / saṃskārā duḥkham / vijñānaṃ duḥkham / yadapītthaṃ paryeṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkham /
S04bsu005_u:20_6: / tatra duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ katamat? tadyathā - yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī,
S04bsu005_u:20_8: / tatra katamadduḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam? yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā aśeṣataḥ prahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo
S04bsu005_u:20_10: / tatra duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadā āryasatyaṃ katamat? yaduta samyagdṛśyā(ṣṭyādi?)bhirāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:20_11: tadyathā - kaścitpuruṣo jvarābhibhūtaḥ kuśalasaṃpaddṛṣṭakarmāṇaṃ śrutaśāstraṃ vaidyamupasaṃkramya kathayedevam - jvare 'śāntibhūto 'smi /
S04bsu005_u:20_13: sa tasya bhiṣak prāṅ nidānaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃ tvayā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ ceti /
S04bsu005_u:20_14: āturastasya kathayet - mayā hi dadhi trapuṣaṃ bhakṣitam,
S04bsu005_u:20_15: annapānaṃ takraṃ pītamiti / sa tasya bhiṣag viśeṣaṇamupadiśya auṣadhamupadiśet /
S04bsu005_u:20_16: evameva jātyādimahājvarasaṃtāpitāḥ sādhavo mahācittabhiṣajaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ nāthaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramya duḥkhajvarāpahaṃ dharmaṃ pṛccheyuḥ /
S04bsu005_u:20_17: tebhyo bhagavān nidānaṃ samudayākhyāmākhyāya āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo mahauṣadhaṃ śāntikaraṃ nirvāṇamupadiśet /
S04bsu005_u:20_18: 'pyenaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayan nacirātsarvaduḥkhakṣayamavāpya nirvāṇapuraṃ gatvā pariśāntimavāpnotīti /
S04bsu005_u:21_0: (7) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katama āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ? tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_1: samyaksaṃkalpaḥ / samyagvāk / samyakkarmāntaḥ / samyagājīvaḥ / samyagvyāyāmaḥ / samyaksmṛtiḥ / samyaksamādhiriti // tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ? astyayaṃ lokaḥ,
S04bsu005_u:21_2: asti paralokaḥ, asti pitā, asti dattam, asti hutam, asti iṣṭāniṣṭasukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaḥ,
S04bsu005_u:21_9: iyamucyate samyagvāk // samyakkarmāntaḥ katamaḥ? kāyavāṅmanasāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vyāpāraḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_13: / tatra prāṇātipātaḥ katamaḥ? prāṇī ca bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:21_14: prāṇisaṃjñī ca bhavati, vadhakacittaṃ cotpādayati, jīvitādvyaparopayati / ayamucyate bhikṣavaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_18: / tatra kāmamithyācāraḥ katamaḥ? parastrī(ṇā) mupabhogo bhartṛrājāmātāpitṛrakṣitānām /
S04bsu005_u:21_20: evaṃ trividhaḥ // anṛtaṃ katamat? sākṣipraśne 'yathābhūtān vitathavacanamanahitā vā arhannasmīti parihāsyavastu,
S04bsu005_u:21_21: idamucyate anṛtam // paiśunyaṃ katamat? abhūtena satyena vā bhedakaraṇavacanaṃ paiśunyam /
S04bsu005_u:21_23: bhavatu, ityanayā buddhyā yad niṣṭhūravacanaśrāvaṇaṃ kriyate,
S04bsu005_u:21_24: tatpāruṣyam // saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ katamaḥ? rājakathā caurakathā dyūtakathā madyakathā strīkathā ākhyāyikākathā /
S04bsu005_u:21_26: vācikameva caturvidham // abhidhyā katamā? paradravyasvīkaraṇecchayā anyasya dravyāṇi tāniḥ mama syuritīyamucyate abhidhyā /
S04bsu005_u:21_28: ayamucyate vyāpādaḥ // mithyādṛṣṭiḥ katamā? nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ,
S04bsu005_u:21_30: etanmānasaṃ trividham / iyamucyate mithyādṛṣṭiḥ // atha samyagājīvaḥ katamaḥ? bhikṣostāvat kuhanā lapanā naimittikatvaṃ naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ lābhena lābhapratikāṅkṣā samyagājīvaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_31: kuhanālapanādayaḥ / tatra kuhanā katamā? bhikṣurdānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā pathi śūnyāgāre niṣīdati dhyāyī - bhikṣurarhanniti lābhasatkāro me bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu005_u:21_32: katamā? iha bhikṣurlābhasatkāranimittameva tvaṃ me mātā,
S04bsu005_u:21_34: Vaidya 316) bravīti / evamādikā lapanetyucyate // tatra naimittikatvaṃ katamat? bhikṣustāvat piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuktvā sakṛdasakṛd yad brūte - yādṛśo 'yaṃ piṇḍapātaḥ,
S04bsu005_u:21_37: idamucyate naimittikatvam // tatra naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ katamat? bhikṣustāvad yatra gṛhe piṇḍapātraṃ na labhate,
S04bsu005_u:21_38: dāpayitukāmaśca bhavati, tatra brūte - adānapatayo nirayaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu005_u:21_41: taṃ ca labdhvā paribhuṅkte / idamucyate naiṣpaṣikatvam // tatra lābhena lābhapratikāṅkṣā katamā? bhikṣustāvadātmīyena dhanena śobhanānicīvarāṇi copakrīya upāsakebhyo darśayati - īdṛśāni vayaṃ vastrāṇi dānapatibhyo labhāmahe iti /
S04bsu005_u:21_44: ayaṃ bhikṣavo mithyājīvaḥ, tasmādviratiḥ samyagājīvaḥ // iha khalu bhikṣavaḥ upāsakasya mithyājīvaḥ katamaḥ? viṣavikrayaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_46: ayamupāsakasya mithyājīvaḥ / asmādviratiḥ / ayamucyate bhikṣavaḥ samyagājīvaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:21_49: / samyaksmṛtiḥ katamāḥ? iha khalu bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā utpanne rāge bāhyātmikayoḥ śarīrayoraśubhākāreṇa yathābhūtadarśī bhavati - santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajomalatvaṅmāṃsam,
S04bsu005_u:21_50: asthisnāyusirā vṛkkā hṛdayam(ā) maka āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇā odarīyakaṃ yakṛt parīṣamaśru svedaḥ khelakaḥ siṃghāṇako vasā lasīkā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā
S04bsu005_u:21_54: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:21_55: sa vitarkavicāravyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasaṃpadyaṃ viharati /
S04bsu005_u:21_57: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate - yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī - tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:21_58: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:22_0: (8) dvāviṃśatīndriyāṇi katamāni? yaduta cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manendriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ jñānendriyaṃ jīvitendriyam,
S04bsu005_u:22_1: anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam, ājñendriyam, ājñātāvīndriyam / imāni bhikṣava dvāviṃśatīndriyāṇi /
S04bsu005_u:23_0: (AvSū, Vaidya 317) (9) tatra bhikṣavaścātvāri dhyānāni katamāni? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:23_1: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:23_3: smṛtaḥ saṃprajanyaṃ ca(saṃprajānan) sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate - yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī - tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:23_4: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamāda duḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:24_0: (10) tatra katame catvāro brahmavihārāḥ? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurmaitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekādrisamaṃ vimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
S04bsu005_u:24_1: tathā dvitīyam, tathā tṛtīyam, tathā caturtham, iti ūrdhvamadhastiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvāvantamimaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśamadhimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:24_2: evaṃ karuṇāsahagatena, muditāsahagatena, upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśamadhimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati /
S04bsu005_u:25_0: (11) tatra katamāścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ? asti duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā /
S04bsu005_u:25_4: tatra katamā sā duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā? ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvrarāgo bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:25_5: tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati / so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
S04bsu005_u:25_8: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni saśīghravāhīni /
S04bsu005_u:25_9: katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
S04bsu005_u:25_10: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇamindriyāṇāṃ mṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryasamādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
S04bsu005_u:25_12: / tatra katamā duḥkhā pratipatkṣiprābhijñā? ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvrarāgo bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:25_13: tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati / so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgatayā rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
S04bsu005_u:25_15: abhīkṣṇaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 318) tīvramohatayā mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
S04bsu005_u:25_16: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni /
S04bsu005_u:25_17: katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
S04bsu005_u:25_18: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
S04bsu005_u:25_20: / tatra katamā sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā? ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva alparāgo bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:25_21: alpadveṣo bhavati / so '(lpa)rāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ
S04bsu005_u:25_22: pratisaṃvedayati / alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
S04bsu005_u:25_24: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni na tīkṣṇāni na śīghravāhīni /
S04bsu005_u:25_25: katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryandriyaṃ smḥtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ /
S04bsu005_u:25_26: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ dhandhātvānmḥdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spḥśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
S04bsu005_u:25_28: / tatra katamā sukhā pratipatkṣiprābhijñā? ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaivālparāgo bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:25_29: alpadveṣo 'lpamohaḥ / so 'lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
S04bsu005_u:25_33: katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
S04bsu005_u:25_34: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
S04bsu005_u:26_1: ..........asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:26_2: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:26_3: tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣu rimameva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakādiparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathāpraṇihitaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceryathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā pratyavekṣate - yaduta ayaṃ kāyaḥ anupūrveṇa samudāgato 'pūrvavināśī paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ suṣira unnāmonnāmanānmānavavraṇasumukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāśīviṣanivāsaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:26_8: / māyeva vañcanātmakaḥ / rājavadājñāvaṅgalaḥ(?) / śatruvadavatāraprekṣī / cauravadaviśvasanīyaḥ / amitravadahitaiṣī / vadhakavatprajñājīvitāntarāyakṛt /
S04bsu005_u:26_12: kuṇapabattīkṣṇagandhī / varcaḥkuṭīvadamedhyākaraḥ / vravatyadunāsahiṣṇuḥ(?) / śalyavattudanārthaḥ / duṣṭasvāmivaddurupacāraḥ / jīrṇagṛhavatpratisaṃskāradhāryaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:26_26: / punaraparaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīramādyuttarakāraṇataḥ parīkṣitavyam /
S04bsu005_u:26_31: pittāśayaṃ prāpya pacyamāna uṣṇībhūtvā vāyvāśayaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu005_u:26_32: paktvā vāyvāśayaṃ prāpto vāyunā vibhajyate pṛthak malaḥ,
S04bsu005_u:26_34: śukram / tadevamādyuttarakāraṇādaśuci śarīramiti paśyatā bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīraṃ navabhirasthiśataiḥ saṣaṣṭhaiḥ samucchritaṃ kudārugṛhavat tribhiḥ śatvisa(?)śataiḥ saṃghātitam,
S04bsu005_u:26_39: dhamanyā gavākṣīkṛtam, saptottareṇa marmaśatena bhinnabhājanamiva jarjareṇa koṭīśatasahasrairaśītibhiśca tṛṇavacchannam,
S04bsu005_u:26_41: mastiṣkasyāñjalinā, medaso 'ñjalinā, tribhirvasāñjalibhiḥ, ṣaḍbhirañjalibhiḥ śleṣmaṇaḥ, ṣaḍbhirañjalibhiḥ pittasya, vāyunā kṛtsnamevāpakarṣitam /
S04bsu005_u:26_42: śoṇitasyāḍhakena, purīṣaprasthaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ vāvayarevadebhiḥ(?) samaiḥ pṛthakpṛthak pūrṇam /
S04bsu005_u:26_43: saptabhistvagbhiḥ parivṛtam, rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ / pittasya vāyunā kāyāgnināviṣṭāgnihotrajaṅgayādajasraṃ
S04bsu005_u:26_45: durgandhi pratisvabhāvam / ko 'trābhimāno bahumānabhāvaḥ? kevalaṃ yācitakabhāṇḍamiva kṣaṇaprayojanārthaṃ śakaṭamiva bhārodvahanāya dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha)vyam /
S04bsu005_u:27_1: prajñāyamānaṃ sa hi bālabuddhi viṣṭapaṭhaṃ(?) yāti vahaṃ na cetā //
S04bsu005_u:28_0: priyaprakāraṃ vahatenāyat drakṣanvivaktuṃ vahate sadā ca /
S04bsu005_u:28_1: kāyaḥ sucokṣaḥ kṛmivacca jantoḥ kuto 'tra rāgo bahumānatā vā // (AvSū, Vaidya 320)
S04bsu005_u:29_0: ityevamādi pratyavekṣanniti / tadyathā bhikṣava ubhayato dvāravinirmuktaḥ koṣṭhāgāraḥ pūrṇo nānāprakārajātasya dhānyatilasarṣapamudgayavamāṣāṇām /
S04bsu005_u:29_1: taccakṣuṣmān puruṣo vyavalokayan jānīyāt - imāni śūkadhānyāni,
S04bsu005_u:29_2: imāni phaladhānyāni / evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣurimameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ yāvat pratyavekṣate /
S04bsu005_u:29_3: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:29_4: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekāt na prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati,
S04bsu005_u:29_5: paripūrayati, pariprīṇayati, parisphuṭayati, tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyādasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmajaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena /
S04bsu005_u:29_6: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ utpalāni vā padmāni vā kumudāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni
S04bsu005_u:29_7: udake magnāni, sarvāṇi tāni śītalena vāriṇābhiṣyanditāni pariṣyanditāni paripūritāni pariprīṇitāni parisphuritāni /
S04bsu005_u:29_8: evameva bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekajena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripūrayati parisphurayati pariprīṇayati,
S04bsu005_u:29_9: tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyamasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena /
S04bsu005_u:29_10: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:29_11: / tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena pratilābhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca parigṛhītā bhavati sumanasi kṛtā sudṛṣṭā supratibaddhā ca divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitaṃ samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau,
S04bsu005_u:29_12: yathaivordhva tathā adhaḥ - iti vivṛtena cetasā parya(va)naddhena divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitaṃ samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
S04bsu005_u:29_13: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake nabhasi madhyāhnakālasamaye ālokapariśuddho bhavati paryavadātaprabhāsvaraḥ,
S04bsu005_u:29_15: evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhīto bhavati aśṛṃṣṭā supratibandhonavamasaṃjñā - vesthitā(?) samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathā divā,
S04bsu005_u:29_16: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt, yathā paścāttathā purā, yathaivordhvaṃ tathaivādho yathaivādhastathaivordhvamiti vivṛtena cetasā aparyavanaddhena divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
S04bsu005_u:29_17: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:29_18: / tatra katamā(samā)dhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣuraraṇyagato
S04bsu005_u:29_19: vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā sukhasya (duḥkhasya) ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ (AvSū,
S04bsu005_u:29_21: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu005_u:30_0: [13] tatra katamāni bhikṣavaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuradhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
S04bsu005_u:30_2: adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan anusmṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
S04bsu005_u:30_3: adhyātmavadenāsu bahirdhāvedanāsu adhyātmabahirdhā vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
S04bsu005_u:30_4: adhyātmacitte bahirdhācitte adhyātmabahirdhā cittānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
S04bsu005_u:30_5: adhyātmadharmeṣu bahirdhādharmeṣu adhyātmabahirdhādharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye /
S04bsu005_u:31_0: [14] tatra katamāni bhikṣavaścatvāri samyakprahāṇāni? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya chandaṃ janayati,
S04bsu005_u:31_1: vyāyacchati, vīryamārabhate, cittaṃ saṃpratigṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti / utpannānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati,
S04bsu005_u:31_2: vyāyacchati, vīryamārabhate, cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti, saṃpraṇidadhāti / anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāya chandaṃ janayati,
S04bsu005_u:31_3: vyāyacchati, vīryamārabhate, cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti / utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye bhāvanāyai asaṃmoṣāya aparihāṇāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai pāripūryai chandaṃ janayati,
S04bsu005_u:31_4: vyāyacchati, vīryamārabhate, cittaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samyak praṇidadhāti /
S04bsu005_u:32_0: [15] tatra katame catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:32_2: /2 // cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me cittamatilīnaṃ bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam /
S04bsu005_u:32_3: /3 // mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me mīmāṃsā nātilīnā bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam /
S04bsu005_u:33_0: [16] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañcendriyāṇi? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
S04bsu005_u:33_1: tatra katamacchraddhendriyam? yayā śraddhayā caturo dharmān śraddadhāti /
S04bsu005_u:33_4: yadyadeva karma kariṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
S04bsu005_u:33_7: idamucyate śraddhendriyam // tatra katamadvīryendriyam? yān dharmān średdhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti,
S04bsu005_u:33_9: idamucyate vīryendriyam // tatra katamat smṛtīndriyam? yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati,
S04bsu005_u:33_10: tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa........... //.........vipraṇāśayati / idamucyate samādhīndriyam // tatra katamat prajñendriyam? yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇa ekāgrīkaroti,
S04bsu005_u:33_13: bhavati / idamucyate prajñendriyam // imāni bhikṣavaḥ pañcendriyāṇi //
S04bsu005_u:34_0: [17] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañca balāni? yaduta śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam /
S04bsu005_u:35_0: [18] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni? yaduta smṛti(saṃ)bodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ gāmbhīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam /
S04bsu005_u:35_1: / iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:35_2: / evaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:35_3: / vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:35_4: / prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:35_5: prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśrita nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:35_6: / samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam /
S04bsu005_u:36_0: [19] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katama āryāṣṭāṅga(mārgaḥ)? tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ /
S04bsu005_u:36_2: / tatra katamā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ? yā lokottarā nātmadṛṣṭisamutthitā na sa.
S04bsu005_u:36_5: iyamucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ // tatra katamaḥ samyaksaṃkalyaḥ? yaiḥ saṃkalpai rāgadveṣa mohakleśāḥ samuttiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu005_u:37_0: tatra katamā samyagvāk? yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati,
S04bsu005_u:37_2: nātmānaṃ parānnānupahanti, tayā samāhitayuktayā vācā samanvāgato bhavati,
S04bsu005_u:37_3: yayā samyagvā samavavadati, iyamucyate samyagvāk // tatra katamaḥ samyakkarmāntaḥ? yatkarma kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākam,
S04bsu005_u:37_8: ayamucyate samyakkarmāntaḥ // tatra katamaḥ samyagājīvaḥ? yadārthavaśena guṇasaṃlekhādutsarjanatā na kuhanatā na lapanatā na naiṣpeṣikatā sṛvatāravācāśīlatā(?) paralokeṣūśakutā(?) ātmalokasaṃtuṣṭiḥ anavayatā āryāntajñātājīvitā,
S04bsu005_u:37_9: ayamucyate samyagājīvaḥ // tatra katamaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ? yo vyāyāmo mithyā,
S04bsu005_u:37_11: taṃ vyāyāmaṃ necchati / yo vyāyāmaḥ samyagāryamārgasatyāvatāro nirvāṇagāmī pratipadarpayati,
S04bsu005_u:37_13: ayamucyate samyagvyāyāma // tatra katamā samyaksmṛtiḥ? yā sūpasthitā aprakampyā ṛjukā akuṭilā saṃsāradveṣādīnavadarśikā nirvāṇapathapraṇetrī smṛtiḥ spharaṇaṃ āryamārgāsaṃmoṣaḥ /
S04bsu005_u:37_14: iyamucyate samyaksmṛtiḥ // tatra katamaḥ samyaksamādhiḥ? yaḥ samyaktvena samādhiḥ /
S04bsu005_u:37_15: yasmin samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasattvapramokṣāya samyak sthitatvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati,
S04bsu005_u:38_0: [20] tatra katamā bhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśākārā ānāpānasmṛtiḥ? hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghaṃ vā,
S04bsu005_u:38_2: dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_4: hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_5: kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_6: kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_7: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_8: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_9: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_10: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ
S04bsu005_u:38_11: prajānāti / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_12: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_13: sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_14: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_15: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_16: prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_18: sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_20: prajānāti / cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_23: Vaidya 324) prajānāti / cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_24: prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ (āśvasan) āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_25: prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_26: abhimodati me cittamāśvasan abhimodati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_27: abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasan abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathā(bhūtaṃ prajānāti) /
S04bsu005_u:38_28: vimucyati me cittamāśvasan vimucyati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_29: vimucyati me cittaṃ praśva(san vimu)cyati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_30: cittamāśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_31: samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_32: evamanityānudarśī virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:38_33: .........pratiniḥsargānudarśī vā praśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:39_0: [21] tatra katamāni catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni? iha bhikṣavaḥ śrāvako 'vetya buddhe prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti /
S04bsu005_u:39_1: dharme 'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - svākhyāto bhagavatā dharmaḥ sāṃdṛṣṭiko nirjvaraḥ ākālika aupanāyikaḥ ihapaśyakaḥ pratyātmavedanīyo vijñairyaduta nadanimadanapadheyāsāṃ(?) prativinaya ālayasamuddhāto dharmopacchedaḥ śūnyatānupalambhaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayo nirodho nirvāṇam /
S04bsu005_u:39_2: saṃghe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - supratipanno bhagavataḥ āryaśrāvakasaṃgho nyāyapratipannaḥ sapratipannaḥ sāmīcipratipanno dharmānudharmapratipanno 'nudharmacārī /
S04bsu005_u:39_4: santi saṃghe srotāpannaḥ / santi saṃghe sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:39_6: santi saṃghe anāgāminaḥ / santi saṃghe arhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakāḥ /
S04bsu005_u:39_7: santi saṃghe arhantaḥ / yaduta cattvāri puruṣayugāni,
S04bsu005_u:39_8: aṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ / eṣa bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ śraddhāsaṃpannaḥ śrutasaṃpannaḥ samādhisaṃpannaḥ prajñāsaṃpannaḥ vimuktisaṃpannaḥ vimuktijñānadarśanasaṃpannaḥ āhavanīyaḥ prāhavanīyaḥ añjalīkaraṇīyaḥ sāmīcikaraṇīyaḥ anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ darśanīyo lokasya yaduta āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato yāni śīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇi adhṛtīni aśabalāni akalmaṣāṇi bhujiṣyāṇi aparāmṛṣṭāni susamastāni vijñapraśastāni jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti /
S04bsu005_u:40_0: [22] katamāni bhikṣavo daśa tathāgatabalāni? tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S04bsu005_u:40_3: Vaidya 325) tathāgatabalam / atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ karmadharmasamādānānāṃ vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:40_10: ekāmapi jātimanusmarati, dve tisraścatasro yāvadanekānyapi jātikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyanusmaratīti vistaraḥ /
S04bsu005_u:40_11: divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānānupapadyamānānapi /
S04bsu005_u:41_0: [23] katamāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya catvāri vaiśāradyāni? iha bhagavān samyaksaṃbuddha ityātmānaṃ prajānīte /
S04bsu005_u:41_1: ime tvayā dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ityatra kaścidvādaṃ samāropayet sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyām /
S04bsu005_u:41_3: nimittaṃ samanupaśyaṃstathāgato bhagavān kṣemaprāpto abhayaprāpta ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:41_5: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti /
S04bsu005_u:41_6: ye punastathāgatairnāntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tānapratisevamānasya nānamantarāyet(?)yat kaścidvādamāropayet iti vistaraḥ /
S04bsu005_u:41_7: yā vā anena pratipadākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikā hīnāṃ pratiraṣāvamāṇo(?) na niryāyāt daketaraḥ(?) samyagduḥkhanāśāya ityatra.
S04bsu005_u:41_8: ....kaścitpūrvavat / kṣīṇāsravasya satamātmānaṃ pratijānataḥ ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā ityatra
S04bsu005_u:41_9: kaścidvādamāropayet sadevaloke samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyāṃ nimittamevaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S04bsu005_u:41_10: nimitta(ma)samanupaśyan tathāgataḥ sthāmaprāpto viharati abhayaprāpta āha(rṣa?)bhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu005_u:41_12: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti /
S04bsu005_u:42_0: [24] katamāstathāgatasya catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvit dharmapratisaṃvit niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit /
S04bsu005_u:43_0: [25] katame bhikṣavo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ? nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitam,
S04bsu005_u:43_1: nāsti ravitam, nāsti muṣitasmṛtitā, nāsti (a?)samāhitaṃ cittam, nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā, nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā, nāsti chandasya hāniḥ, nāsti vīryasya hāniḥ, nāsti smṛterhāniḥ, nāsti prajñāhāniḥ, nāsti vimukterhāniḥ, trivimuktijñānadarśanāni, atīte 'dhvanyasaṅgamapratihataṃ (AvSū,
S04bsu005_u:44_0: [26] tatra katamāni tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni? supratiṣṭhitapādatā tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu005_u:44_2: āyatapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā / dīrghāṅgulitā / jālahastapādatā / mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā / saptotsadaśarīratā / aiṇeyajaṅghatā / kośagatabastiguhyatā / siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā / citāntarāṃsatā / susaṃvṛtaskandhatā / anunnāmatā / pralambabāhutā / viśuddhanetratā / kambugrīvatā / siṃhahanutā / samacatvāriṃśaddantatā / samāviraladantatā / suśukladantatā / prabhūtatanujihvatā / rasarasāgratā / brahmasvarakalaviṅkarutasvaratā /
S04bsu005_u:44_3: abhinīlanetratā / gopakṣmanetratā / sūkṣmacchavitā / suvarṇavarṇacchavitā / ekaikaromakūpatā / uttuṅgapradakṣiṇāvartaromatā /
S04bsu005_u:44_9: / supratiṣṭhitau pādautathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ dṛḍhasamādānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_10: adhastātpādatalayoścakrāṅkitapā datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_11: āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve mātāpitarau satkṛtya caraṇe śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_12: dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_13: jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_14: mṛdutaruṇahastapādatātathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve vividhaprāvaraṇānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_17: ........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_18: kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_19: siṃhahanutā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_20: samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_21: aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_22: samadantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_23: suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā nirvṛttam
S04bsu005_u:44_24: / prabhūta(tanu)jihvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_28: brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?) ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_29: abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_30: gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_31: sūkṣmacchavitā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_34: ekaikaromakūpatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_35: pradakṣiṇāvartaromatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣaṣya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ācāryopādhyāyakalyāṇamitrānuśāsanipradakṣiṇagrāhitayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_36: indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sarvaprāṇānukampanatayā nihataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastratayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_37: suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_38: uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_39: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ parasattvānāṃ ca
S04bsu005_u:44_41: śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā bhinnastūpapratisaṃskāratayā pareṣāṃ ca bhītānāmāśvāsanasaṃghānatayā ca nirvṛttam /
S04bsu005_u:44_42: apramāṇaiḥ kuśalamūlaiśca teṣu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni /
S04bsu005_u:45_1: snigdhanakhāśca uttuṅganakhāśca vṛttāṅgulinakhāśca cittāṅgulayaśca anupūrvāṅgulayaśca gūḍhaśirāśca nirgranthiśirāśca gūḍhagulphāśca siṃhavikrāntagāminaśca nāgavikrāntagāminaśca haṃsavikrāntagāminaśca vṛṣabhavikrāntagāminaśca pradakḥiṇagāminaśca cārugāminaśca avakragātrāśca vṛttagātrāśca anupūrvagātrāśca pṛthugurumaṇḍalāśca paripūrṇavyañjanāśca samakramāśca śucigātrāśca mṛdugātrāśca viśuddhagātrāśca utsadagātrāśca susaṃhatagātrāśca suvibhaktapratyaṅgāśca vitimiraśuddhalocanāśca vṛttakukṣayaśca mṛṣṭakukṣayaśca abhagnakukṣayaśca kṣāmodarāśca gambhīranābhayaśca āvartanābhayaśca samantaprāsādikāśca śucisamācārāśca vyapagatatilakagātrāśca tūlasadṛśasukumārapāṇayaśca snigdhapāṇirekhāśca gambhīrapāṇirekhāśca.
S04bsu005_u:45_2: bimbapratibimbaapratibimbadaśanavadanāśca mṛdujihvāśca tāmrajihvāśca gajagarjitajīmūtaghoṣāśca madhuragurumañjusvarāśca vṛttadaṃṣṭrāśca tīkṣṇasamadaṃṣṭrāśca anupūrvadaṃṣṭrāśca tuṅganāsāśca śucināsāśca viśālanayanāśca āyatalekhanāśca vi(kasi)tapadmanayanāśca nīlotpaladalanayanāśca vyāyatapīnacakṣuṣaśca āyatabhruvaśca samaromabhruvaśca snigdhabhruvaśca pīnāyatakarṇāśca samakarṇāśca anupahatakarṇāśca (AvSū,
S04bsu005_u:45_3: Vaidya 328) supariṇatalalāṭāśca suparipūrṇāśca bhramarasadṛśakeśāśca vṛttakeśāśca śuklakeśāśca asaṃsuḍhitakeśāśca aparuṣakeśāśca suparikeśāśca śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartacakravajrapadmamatsyādilāñchanapādatalāśca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti /
S04bsu005_u:46_0: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā - dharmaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ savyañjanam,
S04bsu005_u:46_1: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayāmi - yaduta arthaviniścayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamiti yato yaduktamidaṃ tat pratyuktam /
S04bsu005_u:47_0: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmāsravebhyaścitāni vimuktāni //
S04bsu005_u:48_0: idamavocadbhagavān / āttamanasaste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
